about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our Commitment to Caregivers
about.description: Spitex JCare was founded to provide comprehensive support to caregiving relatives in Switzerland. We understand the challenges you face and are here to help through personalized support, resources, and guidance. Our team of experienced care professionals specializes in guiding you through the caregiving process and ensuring you receive the support you need.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to Your Most Important Questions

1.question: What services does Spitex JCare offer?
1.answer: We offer a range of support services for caregiving relatives, including personal consultation, caregiving support resources, training, and access to professional care assistance.

2.question: How can I access your services?
2.answer: You can easily reach us through our contact form, and a member of our team will contact you within 24 hours to arrange an initial consultation.

3.question: Are your services covered by health insurance?
3.answer: Many of our services may be covered by health insurance depending on your specific policy. We can help you clarify your coverage and submit necessary documentation.

4.question: In which cantons do you operate?
4.answer: We currently offer our services in the cantons of Zurich, Bern, Basel, and Lucerne. We plan to expand our services to additional cantons in the near future.

5.question: How do you differ from other care services?
5.answer: Our unique approach focuses on comprehensive support for caregiving relatives. We not only provide direct care services but also ensure that caregivers themselves receive the support, training, and resources they need to provide quality care while looking after their own well-being.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This privacy policy informs you about the nature, scope and purpose of the processing of personal data within our online offering and the websites, functions and content associated with it. The privacy policy applies regardless of the domains, systems, platforms and devices used on which the online offering is executed.

data_types_list.content: Content data (e.g., text entries, photographs, videos)
data_types_list.usage: Usage data (e.g., websites visited, interest in content, access times)
data_types_list.meta: Meta/communication data (e.g., device information, IP addresses)

privacy.categories_text: Visitors and users of the online offering (hereinafter we also collectively refer to the data subjects as 'users').

purpose_list.provision: Providing the online offering, its functions and contents

privacy.personal_data: 'Personal data' means any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person; an identifiable natural person is one who can be identified, directly or indirectly, in particular by reference to an identifier such as a name, an identification number, location data, an online identifier or to one or more factors specific to the physical, physiological, genetic, mental, economic, cultural or social identity of that natural person.
privacy.processing: 'Processing' means any operation or set of operations which is performed on personal data, whether or not by automated means. The term is broad and encompasses practically any handling of data.
privacy.pseudonymization: 'Pseudonymization' means the processing of personal data in such a manner that the personal data can no longer be attributed to a specific data subject without the use of additional information, provided that such additional information is kept separately and is subject to technical and organizational measures to ensure that the personal data are not attributed to an identified or identifiable natural person.
privacy.profiling: 'Profiling' means any form of automated processing of personal data consisting of the use of personal data to evaluate certain personal aspects relating to a natural person, in particular to analyze or predict aspects concerning that natural person's performance at work, economic situation, health, personal preferences, interests, reliability, behavior, location or movements.
